title: RFC 5322 Email Address (Addr-Spec)
description: An Internet email address in addr-spec format as defined in RFC 5322 Section 3.4.1. The addr-spec is a specific Internet identifier that contains a locally interpreted string (local-part) followed by the at-sign character (@) followed by an Internet domain. This schema validates the syntactic structure including dot-atom and quoted-string forms for the local-part, and dot-atom and domain-literal forms for the domain.
